name: Resume Projects
body:
![Picture of Martin Locklear](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/locklearm/resume/master/ProfilePic.png)

# Welcome to the resume page for Martin Locklear!

Click [here](https://github.com/locklearm/resume/raw/master/MartinLocklear-Resume.pdf) for a PDF of my resume.

Thanks for taking a look!

* * *

# Projects

### [Fujitsu POS API](https://github.com/locklearm/resume/tree/master/FujitsuAPI)

The code viewable here is a sample of the project not covered by an NDA.  The relevent portion of the project is contained [here](https://github.com/locklearm/resume/tree/master/FujitsuAPI/FujistuRESTAPI).

### [Speech Driven Android App](https://github.com/locklearm/resume/tree/master/WolfWear)

Credit for this project is shared with two others - one is currently a PH.D candidate at NCSU, and the other was hired by IBM Watson.

The bulk of this project can be found in [this subdirectory](https://github.com/locklearm/resume/tree/master/WolfWear/app/src/main/java/edu/ncsu/csc/wolfwear).

### [Jeopardy! Web Scraper & Data Analysis](https://github.com/locklearm/resume/tree/master/Jeopardy)

This was a quickie project I threw together in a few hours one Sunday afternoon (it was never intended to be particularly reusable or maintainable).  I needed to collect some data for a statistics project, and then do a little bit of manipulation/analysis of that data.

### [Source Control Data Mining For AAIT Analysis](https://github.com/locklearm/resume/tree/master/FaultBench)

This is the latest version I have of a research project I was working on with [Dr. Sarah Heckman](http://people.engr.ncsu.edu/sesmith5/) aimed at developing a benchmarking tool for comparison of static analysis alert prioritization techniques (it's a mouthful, I know).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
